sentences.sContent: My only grumble is that there isn't a non-smoking section.
sentences.sCn: 我惟一的抱怨是这儿没有无烟区。

sentences.sContent: They grumble about how hard they have to work.
sentences.sCn: 他们抱怨自己工作得很辛苦。

sentences.sContent: Taft grumbled that the law so favoured the criminal that trials seemed like a game of chance.
sentences.sCn: 塔夫脱抱怨法律如此有利于罪犯，使得审判看来像是一场运气的游戏。

words.tran: 脾气暴躁的；性情乖戾的
出怨言的；喃喃鸣不平的
脾气坏的人；爱抱怨的人
爱抱怨的人；发牢骚的人

trans.tranOther: to keep complaining in an unhappy way
If someone grumbles, they complain about something in a bad-tempered way
